eveHQMessage.title: UPDATE YOUR API KEYS - LAST REMINDER
eveHQMessage.message:
With effect from EveHQ v2.4 due out sometime after the Eve Crucible patch, legacy API keys will no longer be supported in EveHQ.

See http://forum.battleclinic.com/index.php/topic,154971.0.html for details.



- The EveHQ Development Team
